privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
privacy.intro: FIVE Consulting values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.description: We may collect personal information such as name, email, phone number, and professional data provided voluntarily when you contact us or subscribe to our newsletter.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Data
usage.description: We use your information to respond to inquiries, send relevant content, provide contracted services, improve user experience, and comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: 3. Data Sharing
sharing.description: We do not share your information with third parties except when necessary to provide services or as required by law.

security.title: 4. Information Security
security.description: We adopt technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, destruction, loss, or alteration.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience on the website, analyze traffic, and personalize content. You can manage your cookie preferences in our consent banner.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.description: According to the LGPD, you have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. Contact us at contato@fiveconsulting.com.br.

changes.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: This policy may be updated periodically. The most recent version will always be available on this page.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.description: Please read carefully the terms and conditions that govern the use of this website and our services.
terms.intro: These Terms of Use govern the use of the website and the services offered. By accessing or using any functionality, you fully agree to these terms.

usageLicense.title: 1. Usage License
usageLicense.description: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access and use our services.
items: Use for illegal purposes is prohibited

disclaimer.title: 2. Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: Our services are provided 'as is' with no warranties of any kind.
items: We reserve the right to modify services

limitations.title: 3. Usage Limitations
limitations.description: By using our services, you agree not to:

accuracy.title: 4. Information Accuracy
accuracy.description: We strive to keep information accurate and up to date.

links.title: 5. External Links
links.description: Our site may contain links to third-party websites.
items: We do not control external sites
We are not responsible for third-party content

governingLaw.title: 6. Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These terms are governed by the laws of Brazil.
